thread.title: Miss deborah southern
thread.title_full: Naturesbest reviewed by Miss deborah southern

author: Miss deborah southern
title: Miss deborah southern
text: I heard that sage would help with flushing through menopause, I ordered sage tablets and started taking them the day they we're delivered which I must say was very quick from ordering them to receiving the 2 days, it's a little early to say if sage is helping but my flushing has most definitely been as less but it's early days I'm optimistic
